dialog.text: I can make powerful swords for you, but I don't have the materials. If you find some iron ore and a diamond, please bring them to me.
I believe my apprentice would like a word with you.
When you are stronger, come back to me and I can make powerful swords for you.
With Teancum gone, I am sorry to say that my javelins are now useless. He was the only one skilled enough.
Hello, Teancum. How is that javelin working out for you?
If you wish to buy another javelin, it will cost you 2000 senines to cover material expenses.
Hello, Teancum. Would you like to buy another javelin for 2000 senines?

prompt.next_dialog: Great! If it gets used up or lost, I should have another one ready for you.
OK. Please come see me again if you change your mind.

dialog.text: I have observed Teancum's fighting technique, and I designed a weapon perfect for him. I call it the javelin! Teancum can use it once in battle as an item. But if anyone else uses it, I doubt it will do much. I can sell it to you for the cost of the materials, at 2000 senines. Please see me again when you have enough money.

I have observed Teancum's fighting technique, and I designed a weapon perfect for him. I call it the javelin! Teancum can use it once in battle as an item. But if anyone else uses it, I doubt it will do much. Would you like to buy it for 2000 senines?

prompt.next_dialog: Great! If it gets used up or lost, I should have another one ready for you. You should also chat with the swordsmith.
OK. Please come see me again if you change your mind.

dialog.text: Hi, I am the swordsmith's apprentice. I hope I can impress him by coming up with a new weapon design.
